rows.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
When Earth is shaken with her (final) earthquake
And Earth yieldeth up her burdens,
And man saith: What aileth her?
That day she will relate her chronicles,

rows.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
rows.translation: That day mankind will issue forth in scattered groups to be shown their deeds.
rows.transliteration: yawma-idhiy yaṣdurun nāsu ashtātal liyuraw a`mālahum

rows.arabic: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُۥ
rows.translation: And whoso doeth good an atom's weight will see it then,
rows.transliteration: faman ya`mal mithqāla dharratin khayran yarah

rows.arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُۥ
rows.translation: And whoso doeth ill an atom's weight will see it then.
rows.transliteration: wa man ya`mal mithqāla dharratin sharran yarah
